title: Provided further that if any development permission has been issued before the date of coming into force of these regulations and if work is not commenced within validity period and such permission is not renewed (1) in time i
clause_text: Provided further that if any development permission has been issued before the date of coming into force of these regulations and if work is not commenced within validity period and such permission is not renewed (1) in time i.e. before expiry of validity period of one year,then the said development permission shall be deemed to have been lapsed. (1) However, there is no bar to further renew the valid permission from year to year; but such extended period shall in no case exceed three years. Provided further that, it shall be permissible for the owner to -
